sections.description: Professional Aramex shipping integration for WooCommerce with advanced features. This plugin provides seamless integration with Aramex Express shipping services, allowing you to create shipments, print labels, track orders, manage bulk operations, and manually set AWB numbers directly from your WooCommerce store.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/mo-aramex-shipping-integration directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen in WordPress
3. Use the WooCommerce > Settings > Shipping > MO Aramex Shipping screen to configure the plugin
4. Enter your Aramex API credentials to start using the plugin
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.63

  • NEW FEATURE: Manual AWB (Air Waybill) Management interface
  • Added admin interface to manually set, update, or delete AWB numbers for orders
  • AWB manager integrated into order edit page meta box
  • Real-time AJAX validation for AWB numbers (numeric only)
  • Automatic order notes for all AWB changes (set, update, delete)
  • Comprehensive activity logging for AWB management
  • Security: Nonce verification and permission checks
  • HPOS compatible: Works with both traditional and High-Performance Order Storage
  • User-friendly interface with success/error messages
  • Auto-reload after save/delete for updated display

Version 1.0.62

  • Replaced GIF loader with modern CSS rotating spinner for return pickups
  • Fixed response logging to use mo_aramex_log_api_call for proper API log integration
  • Response details now appear in Aramex API logs with structured format
  • Added HTTP code, body length, raw body, and formatted JSON to logs
  • Improved error checking and GUID/ID extraction logging
  • Modern UI: Smooth rotating spinner with clean animation

Version 1.0.61

  • Enhanced CreatePickup response logging with comprehensive details
  • Added HTTP code, response body length, and full body logging
  • Added pretty-printed JSON response for easier debugging
  • Added detailed logging for HasErrors, GUID, and ID extraction
  • Logs now show complete API response flow for troubleshooting

Version 1.0.60

  • CRITICAL FIX: Reverted PaymentType back to Payment - API requires 'Payment' field name
  • Fixed deserialization error: PickupItemDetail data contract expects 'Payment' not 'PaymentType'
  • Resolved HTTP 400 error in CreatePickup requests
sections.faq:
How do I get Aramex API credentials?

Please contact Mohammad Omar at maki3omar@gmail.com to obtain your Aramex API account credentials.

Does this plugin work with all WooCommerce themes?

Yes, this plugin is designed to work with any WordPress theme that supports WooCommerce.

Can I use this plugin for multiple stores?

Yes, you can use the same plugin installation for multiple stores, but each store will need its own Aramex API credentials.

What are the system requirements?

WordPress 5.3+, WooCommerce 3.0+, PHP 7.4+, and SOAP extension enabled.
